resourceTemplates.name: Blueprint T3D Exporter
resourceTemplates.description: Exports the T3D representation of an Unreal Engine Blueprint asset specified by its path using the unreal+t3d://{filepath} URI scheme.

resourceTemplates.name: Blueprint Markdown Summary
resourceTemplates.description: Exports the markdown representation of an Unreal Engine Blueprint asset specified by its path using the unreal+md://{filepath} URI scheme. Provides a structured summary of the Blueprint's graph, variables, functions, and events.
